recipes.name: Spinach Paneer Curry
recipes.steps: Step 1: Heat oil in a pan, add cumin seeds. Step 2: Add spinach and cook until wilted. Step 3: Add paneer cubes and stir-fry until golden brown.

recipes.name: Spinach Paneer Fritters
recipes.steps: Step 1: Grind spinach leaves into a smooth paste. Step 2: Mix with crumbled paneer, salt, and lemon juice. Step 3: Shape into patties and fry until golden brown.

recipes.name: Vegetable Noodle Stir Fry
recipes.steps:
1. Cook noodles according to package instructions.
2. Heat oil in a pan and sauté vegetables of your choice.
3. Combine cooked noodles with vegetable mixture.

recipes.name: Vegetable Noodle Salad
recipes.steps:
1. Cook noodles according to package instructions.
2. Mix noodles with your choice of vegetables, such as carrots and cucumber.
3. Add a simple dressing made from soy sauce and vinegar.

recipes.name: Veg Stir Fry
recipes.steps: Heat oil in pan, add chicken and stir-fry until cooked. Add rice and stir until combined.

recipes.name: Vegetable Fried Rice
recipes.steps: Heat oil in pan, add chicken and scramble until cooked. Add rice and mixed vegetables, stir-fry until combined.

recipes.name: Vegetable Noodle Stir Fry
recipes.steps: Step 1. Heat oil in a pan, Step 2. Add garlic and ginger, Step 3. Add noodles and stir fry.

recipes.name: Shrimp-Free Pad Thai
recipes.steps: Step 1. Cook noodles according to package instructions, Step 2. Heat oil in a pan and add tofu and vegetables, Step 3. Combine noodles with sauce and serve.

recipes.name: Paneer Tikka with Spinach Curry
recipes.steps: Step 1: Marinate paneer in yogurt and spices. Step 2: Grill chicken breast. Step 3: Cook spinach with garlic, ginger, and garam masala.

recipes.name: Shrimp and Spinach Stir Fry
recipes.steps: Step 1: Cook shrimp with garlic, ginger. Step 2: Stir in spinach and soy sauce.

recipes.name: Chicken Fried Rice
recipes.steps: Heat oil in a pan, add chicken and cook until done. Add rice, mix well, and serve.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken with Rice
recipes.steps: Preheat grill to medium-high heat, season chicken with salt and pepper. Grill for 5-7 minutes per side, serve with rice.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken and Rice
recipes.steps: Step 1. Grill chicken for 20 minutes. Step 2. Heat the rice in a pot until heated through.

recipes.name: Chicken Fried Rice
recipes.steps: Step 1. Chop the chicken into small pieces and heat it with oil until cooked. Step 2. Add the chopped onion, garlic, and cooked rice to a wok or large skillet.

recipes.name: Spinach Paneer Curry
recipes.steps: 1. Cook spinach in water until soft. 2. Grate paneer and mix with cooked spinach.

recipes.name: Paneer Spinach Stir Fry
recipes.steps: 1. Heat oil in pan, sauté diced spinach until wilted. 2. Add grated paneer and cook until browned.

recipes.name: Shrimp Noodle Stir Fry
recipes.steps: Heat oil in a pan, add shrimp and cook until pink. Add noodles and stir-fry.

recipes.name: Shrimp Noodle Soup
recipes.steps: Boil water, add shrimp and cook until pink. Add noodles and serve hot.

recipes.name: Chicken Rice
recipes.steps: Cook rice according to package instructions. Grill chicken until cooked through.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken and Rice Bowl
recipes.steps: Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Grill chicken for 5-7 minutes per side. Serve with steamed rice.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken with Rice
recipes.steps: Step 1: Grill chicken, Step 2: Cook rice, Step 3: Mix spices and oil.

recipes.name: Chicken and Rice Bowl
recipes.steps: Step 1: Grill chicken, Step 2: Cook rice, Step 3: Mix soy sauce with oil.

recipes.name: Shrimp Noodle Stir Fry
recipes.steps: Step 1: Heat oil in a pan, add shrimp and cook until pink. Step 2: Add noodles to the pan and stir fry with the shrimp.

recipes.name: Spicy Shrimp Noodle Soup
recipes.steps: Step 1: Boil water in a pot, add noodles and cook until tender. Step 2: Add shrimp to the pot and cook until pink.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
recipes.steps:
Step 1: Grill the beef. Step 2: Warm tortillas.
Step 3: Assemble tacos with grilled beef.

recipes.name: Beef Wraps
recipes.steps:
Step 1: Slice the beef into thin strips. Step 2: Fill tortillas with sliced beef.
Step 3: Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.steps: Cook pasta, brown beef and tomatoes together, combine and serve.

recipes.name: Seafood Pasta Bake
recipes.steps: Preheat oven to 400°F, cook pasta and mix with shrimp, tomatoes, and a sauce of your choice, bake until golden brown.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
recipes.steps: Cook beef, warm tortillas, assemble and serve

recipes.name: Beef Wraps
recipes.steps: Cook beef, wrap in tortillas, add any desired toppings

recipes.name: Spinach Paneer Curry
recipes.steps: Heat oil in a pan. Add paneer and cook until browned. Add spinach and cook until wilted.

recipes.name: Pan-Seared Paneer with Spinach
recipes.steps: Heat oil in a pan. Add paneer and cook until golden brown. Remove from heat, add spinach and serve.

recipes.name: Paneer Tikka
recipes.steps: Marinate paneer in yogurt and spices. Grill chicken breast. Saute spinach with garlic. Serve with grilled chicken and paneer.

recipes.name: Spinach Paneer Curry
recipes.steps: Saute onion, ginger, and garlic. Add chicken breast and cook until done. Add spinach and paneer, and season with spices.

recipes.name: Recipe 1
recipes.steps: Step 1. Cook pasta in boiling water. Step 2. Chop tomatoes and add cooked chicken. Step 3. Mix well.

recipes.name: Recipe 2
recipes.steps: Step 1. Cook pasta in boiling water. Step 2. Chop tomatoes and sauté shrimp with garlic. Step 3. Mix well.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
recipes.steps: Step 1: Slice the beef into small pieces. Step 2: Cook the beef in a pan until it's browned. Step 3: Warm the tortillas by wrapping them in a damp paper towel and microwaving for 20-30 seconds. Step 4: Assemble the tacos by placing the cooked beef onto a tortilla and serving.

recipes.name: Beef Wraps
recipes.steps: Step 1: Slice the beef into thin strips. Step 2: Cook the beef in a pan until it's browned. Step 3: Warm the tortillas by wrapping them in a damp paper towel and microwaving for 20-30 seconds. Step 4: Assemble the wraps by placing the cooked beef onto a tortilla, adding any desired toppings, and rolling up the wrap.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
recipes.steps: Step 1: Boil pasta. Step 2: Heat olive oil in pan with minced garlic. Step 3: Add tomatoes and cook until reduced. Step 4: Combine cooked pasta and tomato mixture.

recipes.name: Pasta alla Norma
recipes.steps: Step 1: Boil pasta. Step 2: Roast tomatoes in oven with olive oil and ricotta salata crumbled on top. Step 3: Mix cooked pasta with roasted tomato mixture and top with egg.

recipes.name: Pasta with Tomato Sauce
recipes.steps: Step 1: Boil pasta according to package directions. Step 2: In a saucepan, heat the tomatoes and egg together until the egg is cooked through. Combine the tomato sauce with the cooked pasta.

recipes.name: Tomato Pasta Salad
recipes.steps: Step 1: Cook pasta according to package directions. Step 2: Mix cooked pasta with chopped tomatoes and a drizzle of olive oil (not included in the list, but can be assumed as optional).

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken with Rice
recipes.steps: Step 1: Preheat the grill. Step 2: Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Step 3: Grill the chicken for 5-7 minutes per side.

recipes.name: Chicken Fried Rice
recipes.steps: Step 1: Heat oil in a wok or large skillet. Step 2: Add diced chicken and cook until browned. Step 3: Add cooked rice, soy sauce, and scallions.

recipes.name: Recipe 1
recipes.steps: Step 1: Boil the pasta. Step 2: Chop the tomatoes and chicken. Step 3: Combine the pasta, tomatoes, and chicken.

recipes.name: Recipe 2
recipes.steps: Step 1: Boil the pasta. Step 2: Chop the tomatoes and sauté the shrimp. Step 3: Combine the pasta, tomatoes, and shrimp.

recipes.name: Shrimp Noodle Stir Fry
recipes.steps: Heat oil in wok, add shrimp and stir fry until pink. Add noodles and cook according to package instructions.

recipes.name: Seafood Fried Rice
recipes.steps: Heat oil in pan, add shrimp and cook until pink. Then add cooked noodles, soy sauce, and serve.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.steps: Heat oil in a pan, add rice and cook until golden. Add chicken and mixed vegetables (bell peppers, carrots, broccoli) and stir fry for 10 minutes.

recipes.name: Vegetable Fried Rice
recipes.steps: Heat oil in a wok or large pan, add rice and cook until golden. Add mixed vegetables (peas, corn, onions) and cooked chicken, stir fry for 5 minutes.

recipes.name: Shrimp Noodle Stir Fry
recipes.steps: Heat oil in pan, add shrimp and cook until pink. Add noodles and stir-fry.

recipes.name: Garlic Shrimp Noodle Soup
recipes.steps: Boil broth with garlic, add shrimp and cook until pink. Add cooked noodles.

recipes.name: Paneer Tikka
recipes.steps: Step 1: Marinate paneer in spinach puree and spices. Step 2: Grill the marinated paneer until golden brown.

recipes.name: Spinach Paneer Curry
recipes.steps: Step 1: Sauté onions, ginger, and garlic. Step 2: Add spinach puree, spices, and paneer. Step 3: Simmer until the sauce thickens.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken with Paneer
recipes.steps: Step 1: Grill the chicken breast. Step 2: Pan-fry the paneer until golden brown.

recipes.name: Spinach and Paneer Curry with Chicken Sausage
recipes.steps: Step 1: Cook the chicken sausage in oil until browned. Step 2: Add spinach and cook until wilted.

recipes.name: Vegetable Pasta
recipes.steps: Boil pasta, mix with tomatoes and serve.

recipes.name: Tomato Pasta Bake
recipes.steps: Preheat oven to 180C, boil pasta, mix with tomatoes, transfer to baking dish, bake for 20 minutes.
